content: Then, this child of fourteen years learned, as in a homework, that which we hide to maidens until their wedding night. She flipped through the drawings of the anatomy book, those superb drawings of a bloody reality. She paused upon each organ, understanding the most secret of them, those upon which is built the shame of men and women.
translations: ita:Allora, questo bambino di quattordici anni impar√≤, come nei compiti, quello che nascondiamo alle fanciulle fino alla lor
